MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Penisarwaun and surrounding area.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.11PM.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties and we expect the power to be restored by 11.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.56PM on 19th February 2021.
